TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawListViewItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件允许你自定义的外观使用所有者描述的控件。The event enables you to customize the appearance of a control using owner drawing. 事件由引发控制属性设置为`true`。The event is raised by a control when the property is set to `true`. 传递到事件处理程序所包含的有关的信息绘制，并可以帮助你绘制项的方法。The passed to the event handler contains information about the to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the item. 使用或属性，以检索有关要绘制的项的信息。Use the or properties to retrieve information about the item to draw. 使用要检索的项的索引属性。Use the property to retrieve the index of the item. 使用属性以执行指定的区域中，实际的绘图属性。Use the property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the property. 若要绘制标准元素不需要自定义项，使用， ，和方法。To draw standard elements that do not need customization, use the , , and methods. > [!NOTE] > 为了避免在所有者绘制，重写时，图形闪烁问题控件并设置属性`true`。To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the control and set the property to `true`. 当你的应用程序调用时，此功能才可用仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上方法。This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何提供自定义方式绘制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to provide custom drawing for a control. 在示例中的控件具有渐变背景。The control in the example has a gradient background. 与负值子项具有红色的前景色和背景为黑色。Subitems with negative values have a red foreground and a black background. 处理程序事件绘制整个项的背景。A handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 处理程序事件绘制的文本值以及文本和背景具有负值的子项。A handler for the event draws the text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 处理程序事件绘制每个列标题。A handler for the event draws each column header. A组件提供一种方法的详细信息视图和列表视图之间切换。A component provides a way to switch between the details view and the list view. 在列表视图中，仅激发事件。In the list view, only the event is fired. 在这种情况下，文本和背景均在事件处理程序。In this case, the text and background are both drawn in the event handler. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Bounds As Rectangle
public: property System::Drawing::Rectangle Bounds { System::Drawing::Rectangle get(); };

summary.span: 获取要绘制的 的大小和位置。

span.span: Gets the size and location of the to draw.

value.span: 表示要绘制的 的界限的 。

span.span: A that represents the bounds of the to draw.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定的位置是相对的左上角于控件。The location specified by this property is relative to the upper left corner of the control. 若要检索特定的各个部分的边界，使用方法。To retrieve the bounds for specific portions of a , use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性中的应用程序提供的自定义绘制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在示例中，处理程序事件绘制整个项的背景。In the example, a handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 在详细信息视图之外的所有视图，此处理程序还绘制前景文本。In all views except the details view, this handler also draws the foreground text. 在详细信息视图中，前景文本中绘制事件。In the details view, the foreground text is drawn in the event. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawBackground() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 的当前背景色绘制它的背景。

span.span: Draws the background of the using its current background color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来绘制使用的当前值标准背景属性。Use this method to draw a standard background that uses the current value of the property. 绘制背景来填充指定的区域属性。The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DrawDefault { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个属性，指示 控件是否将默认绘图用于 。

span.span: Gets or sets a property indicating whether the control will use the default drawing for the .

value.span: 如果系统绘制该项，则为 ；如果事件处理程序绘制该项，则为 。

span.span: if the system draws the item; if the event handler draws the item.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`true`项不需要自定义绘制。Set this property to `true` when the item does not require custom drawing. 当你需要自定义控件，如所选的列表项中的某些项时，这非常有用。This is useful when you need to customize only certain items within the control, such as selected items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#471](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#471)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#471](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#471)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawFocusRectangle() cil managed

summary.span: 如果 具有焦点，则为其绘制聚焦框。

span.span: Draws a focus rectangle for the if it has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于标准周围绘制聚焦框项。Use this method to draw a standard focus rectangle around the item. 通常在指定的区域内绘制聚焦框属性。The focus rectangle is normally drawn within the area specified by the property. 如果控件是在详细信息视图和属性值是`false`，但是，焦点矩形周围绘制的默认文本区域的项的第一列。If the control is in the details view and the property value is `false`, however, the focus rectangle is drawn around the default text area for the first column of the item. 仅当项具有焦点，因此不需要检查项的焦点状态，然后才能调用此方法时，是绘制聚焦框。The focus rectangle is drawn only when the item has focus, so you do not need to check the focus state of the item before you call this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法中的应用程序提供的自定义绘制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在示例中，处理程序事件绘制整个项的背景。In the example, a handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 在详细信息视图之外的所有视图，此处理程序还绘制前景文本。In all views except the details view, this handler also draws the foreground text. 在详细信息视图中，前景文本中绘制事件。In the details view, the foreground text is drawn in the event. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#3)]

summary.span: 使用 的当前前景色和默认格式设置绘制它的文本。

span.span: Draws the text of the using its current foreground color and the default formatting.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawText() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 的当前前景色绘制它的文本。

span.span: Draws the text of the using its current foreground color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法使用的当前值的项文本绘制和属性。Use this method to draw the item text using the current values of the and properties. 在指定的区域内绘制文本属性。The text is drawn within the area specified by the property. 您还可以绘制的文本使用手动通过检索属性。You can also draw the text manually using the retrieved through the property. 时，方法是最有用属性设置为值。The method is most useful when the property is set to a value other than . 在详细信息视图中，此方法绘制的文本，但不绘制的子项的文本。In the details view, this method draws the text for the , but does not draw the text for subitems. 因此，在详细信息视图中，它是一般情况下要绘制的所有更方便的处理程序中的文本事件。Therefore, in the details view, it is generally more convenient to draw all of the text in a handler for the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法中的应用程序提供的自定义绘制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在示例中，处理程序事件绘制整个项的背景。In the example, a handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 在详细信息视图之外的所有视图，此处理程序还绘制前景文本。In all views except the details view, this handler also draws the foreground text. 在详细信息视图中，前景文本中绘制事件。In the details view, the foreground text is drawn in the event. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawText(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags flags) cil managed

span.span: A bitwise combination of values.

summary.span: 使用 的当前前景色以及由指定的 值设置的格式绘制它的文本。

span.span: Draws the text of the using its current foreground color and formatting it with the specified values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法使用的当前值的项文本绘制和属性。Use this method to draw the item text using the current values of the and properties. 中指定的值`flags`参数让你提供格式设置属性，节点标签，如文本对齐方式。The values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the node label, such as text alignment. 在指定的区域内绘制文本属性。The text is drawn within the area specified by the property. 您还可以绘制的文本使用手动通过检索属性。You can also draw the text manually using the retrieved through the property. 时，方法是最有用属性设置为值。The method is most useful when the property is set to a value other than . 在详细信息视图中，此方法绘制的文本，但不绘制的子项的文本。In the details view, this method draws the text for the , but does not draw the text for subitems. 因此，在详细信息视图中，它是一般情况下要绘制的所有更方便的处理程序中的文本事件。Therefore, in the details view, it is generally more convenient to draw all of the text in a handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供属性和显示设备上绘制的有用的方法。The class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性中的应用程序提供的自定义绘制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在示例中，处理程序事件绘制整个项的背景。In the example, a handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 在详细信息视图之外的所有视图，此处理程序还绘制前景文本。In all views except the details view, this handler also draws the foreground text. 在详细信息视图中，前景文本中绘制事件。In the details view, the foreground text is drawn in the event. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Item As ListViewItem
public: property System::Windows::Forms::ListViewItem ^ Item { System::Windows::Forms::ListViewItem ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the to draw.
The to draw.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于访问绘制。Use this property to access the to draw. 这非常有用属性未提供足够信息以满足你的需求。This is useful when the property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs. 属性提供了你可以使用，例如，若要确定某个项是否是选择、 检查，或者已设定焦点的基本状态信息。The property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether an item is selected, checked, or focused. 属性，另一方面，允许你访问的所有成员。The property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the . 你必须直接访问该项，例如，若要绘制值自己一点，而不是使用方法。You must access the item directly, for example, to draw the value yourself rather than using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性中的应用程序提供的自定义绘制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在示例中，处理程序事件绘制整个项的背景。In the example, a handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 在详细信息视图之外的所有视图，此处理程序还绘制前景文本。In all views except the details view, this handler also draws the foreground text. 在详细信息视图中，前景文本中绘制事件。In the details view, the foreground text is drawn in the event. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性检查是否绘制处于特定状态。Use this property to check whether the to draw is in a particular state. 此属性提供有关项目的基本状态信息。This property provides only basic state information about the item. 此属性，例如，可用于确定是选择、 选中，还是已设定焦点的项。You can use this property, for example, to determine whether an item is selected, checked, or focused. 如果你需要知道的详细信息，检索的项通过属性并直接检查其属性。If you need to know more, retrieve the item through the property and check its properties directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性中的应用程序提供的自定义绘制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在示例中，处理程序事件绘制整个项的背景。In the example, a handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 在详细信息视图之外的所有视图，此处理程序还绘制前景文本。In all views except the details view, this handler also draws the foreground text. 在详细信息视图中，前景文本中绘制事件。In the details view, the foreground text is drawn in the event. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic.
